name: kinetics.ts
description: A TypeScript physics engine for 2D Space.

scripts.web: npx webpack && http-server -a localhost -p 8080 -c-1 -d false ./ --proxy http://localhost:8080/examples/index.html
scripts.web:watch: nodemon --exec "npm run web" --watch src --watch examples --ext ts
scripts.server:watch: nodemon --exec "npm run server" --watch src --watch examples --ext js,ts

author: Altanis
